## Waiver
- View a digital copy of our standard [outings waiver](resources/WNwaiver202405.pdf). A physical copy will be present at most of our outings for participants to sign.

## Checklists

- [Westman Naturalists Bird Checklist for Riverbank Centre](resources/Brandon Riverbank Bird Checklist.pdf). Westman Naturalists have produced a bird checklist for Brandon and area, using eBird data and expertise from a number of Westman Naturalists members. This version for Brandon Riverbank Inc highlights birds that are likely to be seen around the Discovery Centre. The checklist can be downloaded here.
